news_items.content: Here's a rewritten version of the news in a more concise and clear manner:
* Chennai airport to soon offer free Wi-Fi to international passengers.
* Authorities are investigating several cases of concealed lines in content creation among Gen Z users.
* Three college students drowned in the Coimbatore River, prompting an investigation into their deaths.
* The Tamil Nadu government has implemented a new sign mandate for shops, which has sparked controversy from shop owners' associations.
* A speedboat accident occurred near Puri, leaving President Sourav Ganguly safe.
